metadata.title: CVE-2016-9071 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Content Security Policy combined with HTTP to HTTPS redirection can be usedby malicious server to verify whether a known site is within a user'sbrowser history. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 50.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
